{{Infobox Berry |name = #25 Grepa |image = [[File:Grepa.png]] |caption = One bite of this very tender Berry fills the mouth with its sweet and tangy flavor. |growtime = 2h 0m 0s |harvest = 24 berries |replant = 20% |points = 600 |flavor =
*0 spicy *10 dry *10 sweet *0 bitter *10 sour }} == Description == '''Grepa''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Aguav]] and at least 1 [[Figy]]. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 5 mins || 56 mins 40 secs || 1 hour 33 mins 20 secs || 2 hours - 4 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:GrepaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:GrepaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:GrepaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 2 hours -
4 hours || --- |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 1 hour 20 mins -
2 hours 40 mins || 16 mulch |- ! Mulch*Sprayduck | 53 mins 20 secs -
1 hour 46 mins 40 secs || 11 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Grepa berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 45px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Figy.png|30px]]
[[Figy]] || || || [[File:Figy.png|30px]]
[[Figy]] |- style="height: 60px;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] || || || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] || |- | || [[File:Figy.png|30px]]
[[Figy]] || || || [[File:Figy.png|30px]]
[[Figy]] |} === Timing Table === {| class="collapsible wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch/Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch*Sprayduck |- | [[Aguav]] || - || - || - |- | [[Figy]] || - || - || - |} Note: Figy and Aguav have equivalent growth times {{Berries}}

{{Infobox Berry |name = #25 Grepa |image = [[File:Grepa.png]] |caption = One bite of this very tender Berry fills the mouth with its sweet and tangy flavor. |growtime = 2h 0m 0s |harvest = 24 berries |replant = 20% |points = 600 |flavor =

It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Aguav]] and at least 1 [[Figy]]. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! 4 hours || --- |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 1 hour 20 mins -
2 hours 40 mins || 16 mulch |- ! Mulch*Sprayduck | 53 mins 20 secs -
1 hour 46 mins 40 secs || 11 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Grepa berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 45px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Figy.png|30px]]

No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch/Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch*Sprayduck |- | [[Aguav]] || - || - || - |- | [[Figy]] || - || - || - |} Note: Figy and Aguav Both have 6 minute growth times {{Berries}}
